backend/main.mo: Main actor for the ICP backend implementing user profiles, announcements, Jama collections, and contact inquiries with role-based access control (admin/user) and blob storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old Announcement records (without id) to new format (with id=0) for schema upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (Jama Collection nav, section, admin panel, React Query hooks) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files describing each component's purpose, styling, and key behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the page title and meta description in Hindi for the Masjid-e-Gausia Welfare Committee site.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections in order (including JamaCollectionSection), manages admin panel open state, and provides the React Query client context.
frontend/src/components/AboutSection.tsx: About section displaying four value cards and a mission panel with a Quranic quote; all stat counters are set to zero.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: A tabbed admin panel component for managing announcements, Jama collections, and contact inquiries, with add/delete functionality and Hindi UI text.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementsSec: Displays a public-facing grid of committee announcements fetched via React Query, with loading, error, and empty states, all in Hindi.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: A contact section with static contact info cards and a validated inquiry submission form that calls the useSubmitInquiry mutation.
frontend/src/components/DecorativePatter: A simple presentational component that renders a full-cover geometric pattern image as an absolutely-positioned decorative overlay with configurable opacity.
frontend/src/components/DonateSection.ts: Displays bank transfer details with copy-to-clipboard functionality and impact statistics to encourage donations, with an Islamic quote for context.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer with branding, smooth-scroll navigation links, contact info, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution badge.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Renders a photo gallery section with a 4-photo grid for 'सालाना जलसा 2026', supporting a lightbox with keyboard navigation (arrow keys and Escape) for browsing images.
frontend/src/components/GeometricDivider: A simple presentational component that renders a full-width decorative section divider image with a max height of 80px.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed navigation header with smooth-scroll nav links, a mobile hamburger menu, login/logout button, donate button, and a conditional admin panel button shown only to authenticated admins.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a mosque background image, committee logo, Hindi/Arabic text, and buttons to scroll to the about section.
frontend/src/components/JamaCollectionSe: Displays a transparent financial record of collected donations fetched via React Query, showing a total amount banner and handling loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button that toggles Internet Identity login/logout, clears the React Query cache on logout, and shows a loading spinner during the login process.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts newly authenticated users to enter their name, then saves the profile via a mutation hook; it cannot be dismissed until the profile is saved.
Renders a grid of nine social service cards (education, medical, housing, food, etc.) with Hindi descriptions, icons, and color-coded styling for a community organization website.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating the caller's user profile and role, including admin status checks, all dependent on the actor from useActor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context and provider using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to child components.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on announcements, Jama collections, and contact inquiries, all delegating to the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Devanagari fonts, defines CSS custom properties for a warm ivory/champagne/orange color palette, and declares reusable component utility classes via Tailwind layers.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the DOM root.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom color palette (ivory, champagne, orange, gold, forest), typography, border radius, shadows, and animations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file recording existing features (Jama Collection section, admin panel, React Query hooks) and pending feature requests for a Hindi-language web app with an ICP backend.
